title: Child-and-Parents Relationships to Children
description: How to get list of child-and-parents relationships to children of a person.

response.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<fs:familysearch xmlns:gx="http://gedcomx.org/v1/" xmlns:fs="http://familysearch.org/v1/" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">
    <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP1" rel="person" title="Person"/>
    <fs:childAndParentsRelationship id="PPP0-PP0">
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/PPP0-PP0" rel="child-and-parents-relationship" title="Child-and-Parents Relationship"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP3" rel="child" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP1" rel="father" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP2" rel="mother" title="Person"/>
        <fs:father resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP1" resourceId="PPP0-PP1"/>
        <fs:mother resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP2" resourceId="PPP0-PP2"/>
        <fs:child resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP3" resourceId="PPP0-PP3"/>
        <fs:fatherFact type="http://gedcomx.org/AdoptiveParent" id="C.1"/>
        <fs:motherFact type="http://gedcomx.org/BiologicalParent" id="C.2"/>
    </fs:childAndParentsRelationship>
    <fs:childAndParentsRelationship id="PPP1-PP0">
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/PPP1-PP0" rel="child-and-parents-relationship" title="Child-and-Parents Relationship"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP1-PP3" rel="child" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP1" rel="father" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP1-PP2" rel="mother" title="Person"/>
        <fs:father resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP1" resourceId="PPP0-PP1"/>
        <fs:mother resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP1-PP2" resourceId="PPP1-PP2"/>
        <fs:child resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP1-PP3" resourceId="PPP1-PP3"/>
        <fs:fatherFact type="http://gedcomx.org/AdoptiveParent" id="C.1"/>
        <fs:motherFact type="http://gedcomx.org/BiologicalParent" id="C.2"/>
    </fs:childAndParentsRelationship>
</fs:familysearch>
